name: Escaping Debt
description:
Ever wish you could run from your problems while money rains from the sky??

Well, now you can in Escaping Debt, a 2D endless runner where the goal is simple, keep your money above zero before dying. See how long you can survive and how much money (or debt) you can collect as you run. 

This game is a remake of my first game created during university and is currently in development. Please let me know of any recommendations you have or any issues you ran into during the game  at:  https://forms.gle/3Nc6xVhx7CYmyEyt9

Thank you for playing.
